entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:04 PM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
